welcome.subtitle: Let's build your perfect operations platform
welcome.helper: This will take about 30 minutes. We'll ask questions about your business to create a customized workspace.

company_description_nlp.prompt: In a few sentences, how would you describe your company?
company_description_nlp.subtitle: Tell us about your business, operations, and what makes you unique
company_description_nlp.helper: Describe your company in your own words. We'll extract key information automatically.
company_description_nlp.placeholder: We are a mid-size MTO denim manufacturer based in Istanbul with 45 staff. We produce custom jeans and jackets for fashion brands across Europe...

company_confirm_extracted.helper: We extracted this information from your description. Click any card to edit.

company_name.helper: This will appear throughout your workspace.

company_logo.helper: Your logo will appear in the header and reports.

company_founded_year.helper: Enter the year your company was established (e.g., 2019).

company_hq_location.prompt: Where is your HQ based? (City, Country)

company_locations_multiple.prompt: Do you operate in multiple locations?
company_locations_multiple.helper: Do you have facilities, offices, or operations in more than one city?

company_locations_list.helper: Add each city or location where you operate.

company_manufacturer_type.prompt: What type of manufacturer are you?

options.label: Make-to-Order
options.description: Custom orders, start production after receiving orders

options.label: White Label
options.description: Private label manufacturing for other brands

options.label: Mixed
options.description: Combination of MTO, stock, and white label

company_manufacturer_type_other.helper: Tell us more about how you operate.

company_client_type.helper: Select the main type of customers you work with.

company_own_brand.prompt: Do you sell your own branded products?
company_own_brand.helper: Do you have your own brand or label that you sell directly?

company_sales_channels.prompt: How do you sell your branded products?
company_sales_channels.helper: Select all channels where you sell your own brand.

company_team_size_total.prompt: Roughly how many people work at your company?
company_team_size_total.helper: Enter the approximate total number of employees.

company_team_split.prompt: Would you like to split this between production and management?
company_team_split.helper: Help us understand your team structure.

company_team_split_production.prompt: How many people work in production?

company_team_split_management.prompt: How many people work in management/admin?

company_capacity_monthly_pcs.prompt: What's your current monthly production capacity (pcs/month)?
company_capacity_monthly_pcs.helper: Enter the approximate number of pieces/units you can produce per month.

company_capacity_utilization_full.prompt: Do you typically run at full capacity?
company_capacity_utilization_full.helper: Are you usually at or near your maximum monthly capacity?

company_capacity_increase_plan.prompt: Do you plan to increase capacity in the next 12 months?
company_capacity_increase_plan.helper: Are you planning to expand production capacity?

company_capacity_increase_pct.helper: Enter the percentage increase you're planning (e.g., 40 for 40%).

company_biggest_challenge_nlp.prompt: What's the biggest challenge you want Groovy to solve first?
company_biggest_challenge_nlp.subtitle: Tell us about your main pain point or challenge
company_biggest_challenge_nlp.helper: Describe the primary challenge or problem you're hoping Groovy will help solve.
company_biggest_challenge_nlp.placeholder: We lose track of WIP and struggle to provide timely status updates to our brand partners...

company_challenge_category.helper: Which category best describes your challenge?

company_long_term_goal_nlp.prompt: In plain words, what's your 12–18 month goal?
company_long_term_goal_nlp.subtitle: Tell us about your strategic goals
company_long_term_goal_nlp.helper: Describe what you want to achieve in the next 12-18 months.
company_long_term_goal_nlp.placeholder: Increase capacity 40% without hurting margins, expand to serve more European brands...

company_goal_category.helper: Select the category that best describes your goal.

company_success_12mo_nlp.prompt: What would "success in 12 months" look like?
company_success_12mo_nlp.subtitle: Describe your vision of success
company_success_12mo_nlp.helper: What specific outcomes would make you feel successful?
company_success_12mo_nlp.placeholder: Lead time under 14 days, first-time-right rate of 98%, capacity increased by 40%...

company_enable_kpi_tracking.prompt: Would you like Groovy to automatically track KPIs towards this vision?
company_enable_kpi_tracking.helper: We can set up dashboards and KPIs to monitor progress towards your success metrics.

company_compliance_has.prompt: Do you hold any certifications or audits?
company_compliance_has.helper: Do you have any compliance certifications or undergo regular audits?

company_compliance_markets.prompt: Do clients or markets enforce specific compliance? Which ones?
company_compliance_markets.helper: List any markets or client requirements for compliance.

company_compliance_reminders.helper: We can set up reminders for audit dates and certification renewals.

company_product_types.prompt: What products do you primarily produce?
company_product_types.helper: Select all that apply. This helps us set up your item catalog.

company_product_types_other.helper: Add each product type you produce.

company_primary_product.prompt: Which product is your main volume driver?
company_primary_product.helper: Select the product that represents the largest portion of your production.

company_materials_list.prompt: What materials/fabrics do you commonly use?
company_materials_list.helper: List the main materials, fabrics, or components you work with.
company_materials_list.placeholder: e.g., 13oz indigo denim, selvedge, YKK zippers

company_track_materials.prompt: Do you track materials separately as SKUs, rolls, or lots?
company_track_materials.helper: Do you manage raw materials inventory with SKUs, roll numbers, or lot tracking?

company_demand_spikes_months.prompt: Do you have demand spikes during the year? Select months that spike.
company_demand_spikes_months.helper: Select all months when demand is typically higher than average.

company_slow_months.helper: Select all months when demand is typically lower than average.

company_decision_maker_title.prompt: Who usually makes day-to-day operational decisions? (role/title)
company_decision_maker_title.helper: Enter the job title or role of the person who makes daily operational decisions.

company_admin_account_create.prompt: Would you like us to create an admin account for this person?
company_admin_account_create.helper: We can set up an admin account for the decision maker with full access.

operations_model_nlp.subtitle: How do you operate? Make-to-order, make-to-stock, or both?
operations_model_nlp.helper: Tell us about your production model and how you handle orders.
operations_model_nlp.placeholder: We work on custom orders. Each order is unique and we start production only after receiving customer specifications. Lead time is typically 2-3 weeks...

operations_shifts.prompt: How many shifts do you run per day?

operations_seasonality.prompt: Do you have seasonal demand spikes?
operations_seasonality.helper: Some businesses experience higher demand during certain months.

operations_peak_months.prompt: Which months are your peak season?
operations_peak_months.helper: Select all months when demand is typically higher.

items_types_nlp.prompt: What types of items do you produce or manage?
items_types_nlp.helper: List the categories of products, materials, or assets you work with.
items_types_nlp.placeholder: We make jeans, jackets, t-shirts, and other denim apparel. We also manage raw fabric, zippers, buttons, and other components...

items_sku_builder.prompt: Let's define what makes up your items
items_sku_builder.subtitle: Build your item structure
items_sku_builder.helper: Start with the basics (name, code, quantity) and add custom attributes that matter to you.

items_complexity.prompt: Do your items have components or sub-parts?
items_complexity.helper: For example, a jacket might have fabric, zippers, buttons, and thread as components.

items_components_builder.helper: For each component type, specify its attributes.

items_tracking_level.helper: Choose the level of granularity for your tracking.

options.label: Per unit
options.description: Each item has a unique ID (serial number)

options.label: Per batch
options.description: Groups of items tracked together (lot numbers)

options.label: Per order
options.description: Track by order only (no individual IDs)

workflow_process_nlp.prompt: Describe your production process from start to finish
workflow_process_nlp.helper: List the stages items go through. We'll create a workflow for you.
workflow_process_nlp.placeholder: We receive fabric, cut patterns, sew garments, wash and finish them, do QA inspection, then package and ship...

workflow_stages_confirm.prompt: Review and edit your workflow stages
workflow_stages_confirm.helper: Drag to reorder, click to edit details, or add/remove stages.

workflow_quality_control.prompt: Do you have quality control checkpoints?
workflow_quality_control.helper: Quality checkpoints ensure items meet standards at key stages.

sites_want_mapping.prompt: Do you want to map your physical facility?
sites_want_mapping.helper: Floor plans help visualize where work happens and track items by location.

sites_floor_builder.helper: Click zones to designate areas: Production, QA, Storage, Shipping, Office.

sites_multiple_floors.prompt: Do you have multiple floors or buildings?
sites_multiple_floors.helper: You can map up to 5 separate floors.

teams_structure_nlp.helper: Tell us about your departments, roles, and how your team is organized.
teams_structure_nlp.placeholder: We have an operations team that handles production, a quality team for inspections, warehouse team for receiving and shipping, and admin team for planning...

teams_floor_app.prompt: Will you have floor workers scanning QR codes?
teams_floor_app.helper: Enable the mobile Floor App for workers to scan items and update status.

integrations_existing_systems.prompt: Do you use an ERP, MRP, or other business system?
integrations_existing_systems.helper: We can integrate with your existing tools.

integrations_system_selection.helper: Select all that apply. We'll prioritize integrations based on your needs.

integrations_api_access.prompt: Do you need API access or webhooks?
integrations_api_access.helper: API access lets you build custom integrations.

analytics_audience.helper: Select all that apply. We'll customize views for each audience.

analytics_metrics_nlp.prompt: What metrics matter most to you?
analytics_metrics_nlp.helper: List the KPIs you track or want to track.
analytics_metrics_nlp.placeholder: On-time delivery, defect rate, throughput, capacity utilization, WIP age...

analytics_chart_preference.prompt: What type of charts do you prefer?

options.label: Trend charts
options.description: Line and area charts for tracking over time

options.label: Comparison charts
options.description: Bar and column charts for comparing values

options.label: Tables
options.description: Detailed data in rows and columns

analytics_report_frequency.prompt: How often do you need reports?

playbooks_auto_tasks.prompt: For each order, should we auto-create purchasing and QC tasks?
playbooks_auto_tasks.helper: Playbooks automate routine tasks when orders are created.

playbooks_task_selection.prompt: Which tasks should be created automatically?
playbooks_task_selection.helper: Select the tasks that apply to your process.

gap_filling.subtitle: We need a few more pieces of information
gap_filling.helper: These details are required to complete your setup.

review.helper: Check everything looks correct. You can go back to edit any section.

review_confirm.subtitle: This will take about 20 seconds
review_confirm.helper: You can always customize further after generation.
